timeline.bodyText: maybe add in the doc, that you check with ==. The term "same" is sadly not well known and sometimes used instead of equals. "Two elements are the same if a == b is true"
timeline.author: MartinWitt
timeline.diffHunk:

+/** Finds the element given in parameter, useful for checking if an element is in an ancestor */
